product_name: The North Face Regulate Pants - Women's
long_description: Streamline your cross-country ski layers with the Regulate soft-shell women's pants from The North Face. They feature a wind-resistant exterior and an interior mesh lining for next-to-skin comfort. Body-mapped knit panels further increase the mobility of these stretch-woven pants for freedom of movement. Comfortable waistband and articulated knees perfect the fit. Easy-access, zippered back pocket secures energy gels or car keys. The women's Regulate soft-shell women's pants from The North Face feature reflectivity at calves to keep you visible in dim light.
short_description: Streamline your cross-country ski layers with the Regulate soft-shell women's pants from The North Face. They feature a wind-resistant exterior and an interior mesh lining for next-to-skin comfort.
